articles.author: Nur Hikmah Md Ali
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets rise, tracking Wall Street gains, as AI-linked stocks rebound - CNBC
articles.description: Investors in the region are looking to Chinese autonomous vehicle firms WeRide and Pony.ai's listing debut in Hong Kong later in the day.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets rose Thursday, tracking Wall Street gains after AMD's third-quarter earnings beat lifted artificial intelligence stocks.
